meta.title: Nergy.space
profile.intro: Professionally, I've always been invested in C# and anything .NET related. Every day I work with Azure, DevOps, dotNET, and TypeScript. I like fiddling with different architectures like Clean Architecture and Micro Services, along with CI/CD tools including Azure Pipelines, Github Actions, and Bicep - and the list goes on. As a hobby, I mostly try out different frameworks, languages, databases and libraries. Check out RetroRanker for my latest hobby project.
